Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"

::Dark Prime/Cerberus::

    Dark Prime watched the other bots leave for th=
e CF, his old home. He turned and went towards the Destron base. He had hea=
rd firing and almost wanted to rush away. He got there in time to see many =
bots leaving.
    "Who is the leader here?" He asked one of the bots walkin=
g towards a wreak of a ship.
    Cerberus turned, he saw this resemblance o=
f Prime and was somewhat amazed. "I am, why?"
    "I am going to take down =
the Alliance," Dark Prime said. "And I wish for you to help."
    Cerberus =
walked up and took Prime's hand. "Good plan. Take down the Alliance. And ho=
w are we to do that? We don't even have a functional base to use for retrea=
t. But wait, we do have weapons."
    "Excellent, let me see, we would have=
 ten bots to help. Yours and mine included. To bad those other bots didn't =
want to help," Dark Prime said.
    "Yes, well I belive I have begun a Civi=
l War, but no matter. They won't last very long without a base, or weapons.=
" Cerberus said. He had been sizing up this bot since the beginning. He kne=
w that in an unarmed fight he would win. But he didn't know what the bot ha=
d for capabilities.
    Dark Prime looked out through cold eyes. He had als=
o been sizing the bot up. This bot was stronger than he, but not connected =
to the Oracle. And he was a liar. Something didn't fit. "So who sent you to=
 the Beast Wars?"
    Cerberus was taken aback from the question, now he kn=
ew that this bot had a deeper connection to things. "Magmatron," He said af=
ter regaining composure.
    Dark Prime knew that he was lying. All he need=
ed now was a way to exploit that lie.
